comment: The predicate " ` P ` is a limit point of ` S ` " in terms of neighborhoods. Definition of limit point in [Munkres] p. 97. Although Munkres uses open neighborhoods, it also works for our more general neighborhoods. (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
